page.title: 08Martello Towers Cont.
page.content:
On the gun deck, there is a twenty four pound gun. Before you reach the gun there is a door with a hole to poke ammunition through to the people firing the gun. The bricks came from London and were provided by Messrs Helam and Robertson of Old Bond Street. The work was inspected by two engineer officers,{Captain Cunningham and{Captain Goldfinch.
Two of the towers were built to protect one of the sluices which controlled the water level of the marsh.
The towers were constructed with circular walls so if cannon balls hit the walls, the corners would not fall off.
